titles.title: For the relief of Peter Short, Hazel Rosemary Short, Lee Adam Short, Dean Short, and Lynsey-Ann Short.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Law, Immigration, and Refugees.

bill.summary: 6/10/1993--Introduced. Grants permanent resident status under the Immigration and Nationality Act to certain named individuals.
